In the following pages, the image should touch all the borders except for, respectively:

* left padding
* bottom padding
* right padding
* top padding

.. raw:: pdf

   PageBreak padleft

.. image:: images/biohazard.png
    :width: 8cm
    :height: 9cm

.. raw:: pdf

   PageBreak padbottom

.. image:: images/biohazard.png
    :width: 9cm
    :height: 8cm

.. raw:: pdf

   PageBreak padright

.. image:: images/biohazard.png
    :width: 8cm
    :height: 9cm

.. raw:: pdf

   PageBreak padtop

.. image:: images/biohazard.png
    :width: 9cm
    :height: 8cm
